attributes.action: stop non resident parents having to pay child maintenance without contact unless good reasons are given
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Non resident parents are forced to pay child maintenance regardless of whether they have any contact with the child at all, i propose that maintenance should not have to be paid without contact arrangements or court order for contact unless good reason otherwise.
it is expensive enough to have to pay for court costs as it is without having to pay extra money that doesn't even necessarily go to the child when the contact has been stopped by a parent for no good reason.
